feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: SSW 34 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
